data.lyric:
[ti:The Christmas Song]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:Nat King Cole in Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You) - Nat King Cole
[00:13.71]Chestnuts roasting on an open fire
[00:19.07]
[00:20.83]Jack frost nipping at your nose
[00:25.19]
[00:27.57]Yuletide carols being sung by a choir
[00:33.33]
[00:34.26]And folks dressed up like eskimos
[00:38.82]
[00:40.00]Everybody knows a turkey and some mistletoe
[00:47.13]
[00:48.81]Help to make the season bright
[00:53.30]
[00:55.98]Tiny tots with their eyes all aglow
[01:00.67]
[01:01.38]We'll find it hard to sleep tonight
[01:07.15]
[01:08.10]They know that santa's on his way
[01:13.56]
[01:15.09]He's loaded lots of toys and goodies on his sleigh
[01:20.42]
[01:21.61]And every mother's child is gonna spy
[01:27.31]
[01:28.22]To see if reindeer really know how to fly
[01:34.49]
[01:35.31]And so i'm offering this simple phrase
[01:42.12]
[01:43.48]To kids from one to n y-two
[01:48.23]
[01:50.02]Alought it's been said
[01:52.25]
[01:53.05]Many times many ways
[01:55.77]Merry christmas to you
[02:01.43]
[02:30.24]And so i'm offering this simple phrase
[02:37.62]
[02:39.13]To kids from one to n y-two
[02:43.95]
[02:45.86]Alought it's been said
[02:48.12]
[02:49.04]Many times many ways
[02:51.79]Merry christmas to you
